verses.text: Furthermore \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*, \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whom \w alone|strong="H0259"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, \add is yet\add* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* and \w tender|strong="H7390"\w*, and the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add is\add* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*: for the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w* \add is\add* not for \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, but for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

Now I have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* with all my \w might|strong="H3581"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w* the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for \add things to be made\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* for \add things\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* for \add things\add* of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, the \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* for \add things\add* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*, and \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* for \add things\add* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*; \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \add stones\add* to be \w set|strong="H4394"\w*, \w glistering|strong="H6320"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and of divers \w colours|strong="H7553"\w*, and all manner of \w precious|strong="H3368"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w marble|strong="H7893"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w*.

Moreover, because I have set my \w affection|strong="H7521"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, I \w have|strong="H3426"\w* of mine own proper \w good|strong="H5459"\w*, of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* and \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, \add which\add* I have \w given|strong="H5414"\w* to the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, over and \w above|strong="H4605"\w* all that I have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*,

\add Even\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, of the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of \w Ophir|strong="H0211"\w*, and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w refined|strong="H2212"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, to \w overlay|strong="H2902"\w* the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w houses|strong="H1004"\w* \add withal:\add*

The \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* for \add things\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* for \add things\add* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and for all manner of \w work|strong="H4399"\w* \add to be made\add* by the \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* of \w artificers|strong="H2796"\w*. And who \add then\add* is \w willing|strong="H5068"\w* to \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* his \w service|strong="H3027"\w* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*?\f + \fr 29.5 \ft consecrate his service: Heb. fill his hand\f*

¶ Then the \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* and \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of \w thousands|strong="H0505"\w* and of \w hundreds|strong="H3967"\w*, with the \w rulers|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, offered \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w*,

And \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* for the \w service|strong="H5656"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* and ten \w thousand|strong="H7239"\w* \w drams|strong="H0150"\w*, and of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, and of \w brass|strong="H5178"\w* \w eighteen|strong="H8083"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w*, and one \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w talents|strong="H3603"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

And they with whom \add precious\add* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* were \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w gave|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* to the \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, by the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Jehiel|strong="H3171"\w* the \w Gershonite|strong="H1649"\w*.

Then the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w*, for that they offered \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w*, because with \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* they offered \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* to the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* also \w rejoiced|strong="H8055"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w joy|strong="H8057"\w*.

¶ Wherefore \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*: and \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* thou, 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* our \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* and \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Thine, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add is\add* the \w greatness|strong="H1420"\w*, and the \w power|strong="H1369"\w*, and the \w glory|strong="H8597"\w*, and the \w victory|strong="H5331"\w*, and the \w majesty|strong="H1935"\w*: for all \add that is\add* in the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add is thine;\add* thine \add is\add* the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and thou art \w exalted|strong="H4984"\w* as \w head|strong="H7218"\w* above all.

Both \w riches|strong="H6239"\w* and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* \add come\add* of \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, and thou \w reignest|strong="H4910"\w* over all; and in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add is\add* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* and \w might|strong="H1369"\w*; and in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \add it is\add* to make \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, and to give \w strength|strong="H2388"\w* unto all.
Now therefore, our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, we \w thank|strong="H3034"\w* thee, and \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thy \w glorious|strong="H8597"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

But who \add am\add* I, and what \add is\add* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, that we should \w be|strong="H6113"\w* \w able|strong="H3581"\w* to offer so \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* after this sort? for all things \add come\add* of thee, and of thine \w own|strong="H3027"\w* have we \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee.\f + \fr 29.14 \ft be able: Heb. retain, or, obtain strength\f*\f + \fr 29.14 \ft of thine…: Heb. of thine hand\f*

For we \add are\add* \w strangers|strong="H1616"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee, and \w sojourners|strong="H8453"\w*, as \add were\add* all our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*: our \w days|strong="H3117"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \add are\add* as a \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*, and \add there is\add* none \w abiding|strong="H4723"\w*.\f + \fr 29.15 \ft abiding: Heb. expectation\f*

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, all this \w store|strong="H1995"\w* that we have \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* thee an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for thine \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \add cometh\add* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \add is\add* all thine own.

I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* also, my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, that thou \w triest|strong="H0974"\w* the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, and hast \w pleasure|strong="H7521"\w* in \w uprightness|strong="H3476"\w*. As for me, in the \w uprightness|strong="H4339"\w* of mine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* I have willingly \w offered|strong="H5068"\w* all these things: and now have I \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* with \w joy|strong="H8057"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, which are \w present|strong="H4672"\w* here, to offer \w willingly|strong="H5068"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 29.17 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* this for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* in the \w imagination|strong="H3336"\w* of the \w thoughts|strong="H4284"\w* of the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* their \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* unto thee:\f + \fr 29.18 \ft prepare: or, stablish\f*

And \w give|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* my \w son|strong="H1121"\w* a \w perfect|strong="H8003"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* thy \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, thy \w testimonies|strong="H5715"\w*, and thy \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all \add these things\add*, and to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w palace|strong="H1002"\w*, \add for\add* the which I have made \w provision|strong="H3559"\w*.

¶ And \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w*, Now \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*. And all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and bowed down their \w heads|strong="H6915"\w*, and \w worshipped|strong="H7812"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.

And they \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and \w offered|strong="H5927"\w* burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, on the \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w* after that \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add even\add* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w bullocks|strong="H6499"\w*, a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w rams|strong="H0352"\w*, \add and\add* a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, with their drink \w offerings|strong="H5262"\w*, and \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* in \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* for all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* on that \w day|strong="H3117"\w* with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w*. And they made \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* the second \w time|strong="H8145"\w*, and \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* \add him\add* unto the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add to be\add* the chief \w governor|strong="H5057"\w*, and \w Zadok|strong="H6659"\w* \add to be\add* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*.

Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* sat \w on|strong="H3427"\w* the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* as \w king|strong="H4428"\w* instead of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and \w prospered|strong="H6743"\w*; and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w obeyed|strong="H8085"\w* him.

And all the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, and the mighty \w men|strong="H1368"\w*, and all the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* likewise of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, submitted \w themselves|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.\f + \fr 29.24 \ft submitted…: Heb. gave the hand under Solomon\f*

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w magnified|strong="H1431"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H4605"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and \w bestowed|strong="H5414"\w* upon him \add such\add* \w royal|strong="H4438"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1935"\w* as had not been on any \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.
¶ Thus \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And the \w time|strong="H3117"\w* that he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \add was\add* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*; \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* he in \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \add years\add* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* he in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

And he \w died|strong="H4191"\w* in a \w good|strong="H2896"\w* old \w age|strong="H7872"\w*, \w full|strong="H7649"\w* of \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w riches|strong="H6239"\w*, and \w honour|strong="H3519"\w*: and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* his \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead.

Now the \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w first|strong="H7223"\w* and \w last|strong="H0314"\w*, behold, they \add are\add* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* in the \w book|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Samuel|strong="H8050"\w* the \w seer|strong="H7200"\w*, and in the \w book|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Nathan|strong="H5416"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, and in the \w book|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Gad|strong="H1410"\w* the \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*,\f + \fr 29.29 \ft book: or, history: Heb. words\f*

With all his \w reign|strong="H4438"\w* and his \w might|strong="H1369"\w*, and the \w times|strong="H6256"\w* that went \w over|strong="H5674"\w* him, and over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and over all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w countries|strong="H0776"\w*.
